title: Hey Riot, right here is a good idea.
body:
So I was thinkin.. instead of tuning BE pricing on rank 6 and 7, how about just giving a small % chance of giving you a shard for the champ you got an S+/S/S- on? maybe like 5% for S-, 15% for S, and 35% for S+? sure it gives over a bit of extra BE in the long run, but if you own that champion already, clearly you've mastered them and deserve a reward, and if you earn a shard you can unlock the mastery without needing to blow that ludicrous amount of BE on it. You can even cap the reward to 2 shards per champ so you can't just BE farm on your main.

Honestly this does a lot to solve peoples' problems with the system in a cool way that doesn't impact BE earnings all that much in the long run. Sure you could earn more BE by farming these if you didnt' care about mastery unlocks, but that is silly as the shard you get is far more valuable using it to unlock a mastery than it is to dust for BE.

honestly I would love if this was a thing... sadly I doubt anyone of importance will see this or consider it....
